summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a meeting setup involving Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, communicates with Lesley Groff about scheduling a meeting for the week of October 8, 2013, to discuss Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in the email correspondence, coordinating the meeting with Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team who will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as having communicated with Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the client whose accounts are being managed by Deutsche Bank and is the subject of the meeting being scheduled.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are collaborating on scheduling a meeting with Epstein.
Paul is part of the Deutsche Bank team managing Epstein's accounts.
Harry communicated with Amanda Kirby regarding Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting is being scheduled for the week of October 8, 2013, to discuss Epstein's accounts.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.
The meeting is proposed for October 7 or 8, 2013.
Harry informed Amanda that Epstein requested the meeting.
Lesley Groff is also involved in the scheduling of the meeting.
